languages.text: "Единственный способ не дать этому повториться — уничтожить этого предателя. Он должен ответить за все".

traits.locale_text: "Единственный способ не дать этому повториться — уничтожить этого предателя. Он должен ответить за все".

languages.text: "The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."
languages.original_text: "Единственный способ не дать этому повториться — уничтожить этого предателя. Он должен ответить за все".

traits.locale_text: "The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything."
"The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything."
"The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must atone for everything."
"The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must atone for everything."
"The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."
"The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."

languages.text: 「同じことが二度と起きないようにするには、あの裏切り者を破滅させなければならない。彼には全ての償いをしてもらわねば」
languages.original_text: "The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."

traits.locale_text: 「同じことが二度と起きないようにするには、あの裏切り者を破滅させなければならない。全ての償いをしてもらわねば」

languages.text: “阻止这种事情唯一的方法，就是消灭那个叛徒。他必须为他犯下的罪行赎罪。”
languages.original_text: "The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."

traits.locale_text: “阻止这种事情唯一的方法，就是消灭那个叛徒。他必须为他犯下的所有罪行赎罪。”

languages.text: «La única forma de evitar que vuelva a ocurrir es matar a ese traidor. Debe responder por todo lo que ha hecho».
languages.original_text: "The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."

traits.locale_text: «La única forma de evitar que vuelva a ocurrir es matar a ese traidor. Debe pagar por todo lo que ha hecho».

languages.text: "Wir können nur verhindern, dass das wieder geschieht, indem wir diesen Verräter vernichten. Er muss sich für alles, was er getan hat, verantworten."
languages.original_text: "The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."

traits.locale_text: "Wir können nur verhindern, dass das wieder geschieht, indem wir diesen Verräter vernichten. Er muss für alles büßen."

languages.text: « Pour ça, le seul moyen, c'est de détruire ce traître. Il doit payer pour tout ce qu'il a fait. »
languages.original_text: "The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."

traits.locale_text: « Pour ça, le seul moyen, c'est de détruire ce traître. Il doit payer pour tout ce qu'il a fait. »

languages.text: "Tüm bunların tekrar yaşanmasına engel olmanın tek yolu, o haini ortadan kaldırmak. Yaptığı her şeyin hesabını vermeli."
languages.original_text: "The only way to stop it from happening again is to destroy that traitor. He must answer for everything he has done."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm bunların tekrar yaşanmasına engel olmanın tek yolu, o haini ortadan kaldırmak. Yaptığı her şeyin hesabını vermeli."
